{"rule":"LC_AFTER_PERIOD","sentence":"^\\QFor example, virtual ports created by software won't show up in the list of\navailable inputs/outputs of MIDI Access handle with disabled\n{@linkcode RequestMIDIAccessOptions.software} flag.\\E$"}
